Statute.Title: Industrial and Regional Development Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Développement industriel et régional, Loi sur le)

Minister.Text: Minister of Industry (SI/91‑99); Minister of Industry, except section 3, in relation to the Province of Quebec (SI/91‑99, SI/93‑98, SI/93‑171, SI/93‑206, SI/96‑16); Minister for the purposes of the Atlantic Canada Opportunities Agency Act, except s. 3, in relation to the Atlantic provinces (SI/88‑177); Minister of Western Economic Diversification, except s. 3, in relation to the Western provinces (SI/88‑116)

CIF.Text: CIF, R.S., c. 11 (4th Supp.) in force 28.06.88 see SI/88‑119
CIF, R.S., c. 41 (4th Supp.), s. 52 repealed before coming into force 31.12.2011 see 2008, c. 20, s. 3
CIF, 1993, c. 28, s. 78 (Sch. III, items 78 and 79) in force 01.04.99 see s. 79
